description:
Surf boots for colder water adventures. These boots have a Thermolite IR lining and 5mm thick neoprene that's comfortable and warm in water temperatures around om 8 to 12˚C. Rubber bottoms keep the sensitivity between your feet and your board intact.

  • 5mm neoprene provides comfortable insulation in water temperatures around 8 to 12˚C
  • Plush Thermolite IR liner dries quickly between sessions
  • Pull up ankle loop makes for easy entry
  • Instep hook-and-loop strap provides a secure fit
  • Contoured fit through the heel and instep for comfort
  • Hidden seams are taped for added durability
  • Single-layer rubber sole is durable and helps you feel your board underfoot
name: Xcel Infiniti Round Toe 5mm Boots - Unisex
